subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Gary Harris scored 25 points, Adreian Payne added 23 and No. 13 Michigan State converted a school-record 17 3-pointers in a 94-79 victory over Purdue.
snippet: Gary Harris scored 25 points, Adreian Payne added 23 and No. 13 Michigan State converted a school-record 17 3-pointers in a 94-79 victory over Purdue.
